name: 千雪
text: お肉とお野菜、スタンバイ
trans: Standby the meat and vegetables!

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへ、それじゃそろそろお鍋の登場だね☆
千雪さん、どこにあるか教えて～
trans:
Ehehe, well then, it's time for the pot to make its 
appearance☆ Lemme know where it is, Chiyuki-san～

name: 千雪
text: わ、ありがとう、甘奈ちゃん
trans: Waa, thank you, Amana-chan.

name: 千雪
text:
えっと、棚の２番目かな
箱のまま入ってるから……
trans:
Umm, I think it's on the second row of the shelf. 
Since it's still left in the box...

name: 甘奈
text:
あっ、ほんとだ！
もしかして新しいやつ？
trans:
Ah, it really was here! 
Lemme guess, it's brand new?

name: 千雪
text: うん、しっかりめに洗った方がよさそう
trans: Yes, it'd be better if we wash it thoroughly then.

name: 甘奈
text:
はーい！
わ！　すごい大きいね！
trans: Alright! Wow, it's so huge!

name: 千雪
text:
そ、そうなの……
可愛かったから、つい……！
trans: I-Is that so... It was cute, so I just had to get it...!

name: 甘奈
text:
いいと思う！　
大は小を兼ねるっていうし！
trans:
I think that was a good idea! As the saying goes, 
better too big than too small!

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃんもできた？
trans: Are you done too, Tenka-chan?

name: 甜花
text:
うん……！
ウインナーのタコさん、いっぱいできた……！
trans: Yup...! I've made lots of octopus-shaped sausages...!

name: 甘奈
text:
ゴマでちゃんと顔ができてる☆
えへへ、かわいー！
trans:
The sesame seeds make for such a nice face ☆ 
Ehehe, it's cuteー!

name: 千雪
text: ほんとだ、いいお顔
trans: It really does have a nice face.

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……やった……！
trans: Ehehe... yay...!

name: 千雪
text: それじゃ、お野菜いきます……！
trans: Well then, the vegetables are going in...!

name: 甘奈
text:
わ……！
お野菜いっぱい！
trans: Waa...! So many of them!

name: 千雪
text: あ、こんなに食べれないかな？
trans: Ah, perhaps you can't eat this much?

name: 甘奈
text:
ううん、お野菜いっぱい入ってた方が美味しいし
ヘルシーだからうれしいな！
trans:
Not at all, I'm glad it's full of vegetables since it's 
tastier and healthier that way!

name: 甜花
text: うん、うん……！
trans: Yeah, yeah...!

name: 千雪
text: ふふ、よかった
trans: Fufu, that's good.

name: 千雪
text:
美味しくなりますように……
──あとはお肉だけだから、待っててね
trans:
For it to become extra delicious... 
──All that's left is the meat, so let's wait.

name: 甘奈
text:
わー……！
いい匂い……！
trans: Wow...! What a nice smell...!

name: 甜花
text:
あぅ……
お腹空いた……
trans: Auu... I'm starving...

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈もお腹空いた……
けど……我慢我慢……！
trans: Amana's starving too... but... patience, patience...!

name: 甜花
text:
う、うん……
我慢……！
trans: Y-Yeah... patience...!

name: 千雪
text: お待たせ～！
trans: Thanks for waiting～!

name: 甘奈
text: わぁ……！
trans: Waa...!

name: 甜花
text: 美味しそう……！
trans: It looks tasty...!

name: 千雪
text: お野菜、いい感じになったみたい
trans: Seems like the vegetables turned out nicely!

name: 千雪
text: ふたりのアドバイスのおかげ……！
trans: Thanks to both of your advice...!

name: 甜花
text: あ、あふい……
trans: I-Ish hawt...

name: 甘奈
text:
！　甜花ちゃん
ちゃんとふーふーしてから食べてね……！？
trans:
Tenka-chan! Make sure you blow and cool it down 
before eating it...!?

name: 甜花
text: う、うん……！
trans: O-Okay...!

name: 千雪
text:
ふふふっ
タコさんも真っ赤
trans: Fufufu, the octopus sausages are bright red too.

name: 千雪
text: ゆっくり、食べてあげてください……！
trans: Please take your time to enjoy it...!

name: 甘奈＆甜花
text: はーい！
trans: Alright!

name: 甘奈
text: ふー……あったまるー……
trans: Phew... I'm warming up...

name: 千雪
text: うん……
trans: Same here...

name: 甜花
text: ３人で食べたら……３倍あったかい……
trans:
Since the three of us are eating together... 
We are thrice as warm...

name: 千雪
text: あったかくて、楽しい
trans: It's warm and fun.

name: 甘奈
text: うん……！　めっちゃ楽しいよね！
trans: Agreed...! It's super fun!

name: 千雪
text: お鍋も嬉しそう……
trans: The pot looks pleased too...

name: 甘奈
text:
千雪さん……もしかして……
みんなでお鍋するために買ってくれたの！？
trans:
Chiyuki-san... No way... Did you buy this hoping that 
we could have hotpot together!?

name: 千雪
text:
……あ、あの
ふふ────
trans: ...U-Umm. Fufu──

name: 千雪
text:
ばれちゃった……！
ちょっと、恥ずかしいな………
trans: I got caught...! Makes me feel a bit embarrassed...

name: 千雪
text:
衝動買いだったんだけど、
でも、３人で囲めたら楽しいなって思ってて──
trans:
It was an impulse purchase, but I did think it would be 
nice if the three of us could gather together──

name: 甜花
text: 甜花も……楽しい……！
trans: Tenka thinks... it's nice too...!

name: 甘奈
text: ３人で作ったら、３倍美味しいもんね！
trans:
If the three of us cook it together, it'd be thrice as 
tasty!

name: 甘奈
text: 千雪さん、誘ってくれてありがと！
trans: Thanks for inviting us over, Chiyuki-san!

name: 千雪
text:
ううん、私こそありがとうなの……！
お鍋、できて嬉しかった
trans:
It's fine, I'm the one who should be thanking you 
two...! I'm glad we could have hotpot together.

name: 甜花
text:
今度は……
お魚のお鍋、食べたいな……！
trans: Next time... I'd like to try fish hotpot...!

name: 千雪
text: わ、それもいい……！
trans: Waa, that sounds good too...!

name: 甘奈
text: じゃあ、次は海鮮鍋だね！
trans: Alright then, we shall have seafood hotpot next time!

name: 千雪
text: ふふっ
trans: Fufu.

name: 千雪
text:
あぁ……
あったかーい……！
trans: Ahh... It truly does feel warm...!
